metadata.title: CVE-2024-0749 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A phishing site could have repurposed an `about:` dialog to show phishingcontent with an incorrect origin in the address bar. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 122, Firefox ESR < 115.7, and Thunderbird < 115.7.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
